title: Collaborative Network-Based Science Education Design Workshop: Online·Blended Learning Innovation Using Visualization Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A program strengthening elementary school teachers’ competency in developing integrated online-offline educational materials for science classes.

learning_goals: Creates three or more learner engagement-centered science education designs using visualization tools in collaborative workshops
Incorporates two or more activities for creative skill development beyond the traditional 'lecture-practice-application' model
Develops and shares one hybrid assessment tool applicable in VR/simulation environments

resources: Visual learning design tools (e.g., Miro, Padlet)
VR content library for science education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
